name: The Economy Of Dice
description:
Summary - 

Mr. Hat has become trapped on an island with an old Keep/Castle, collect items and upgrade your inventory before everything falls apart.

Controls -

Left Mouse Button - Move.

LeftCtrl - Pick up items when nearby (Sorry We Forgot to Change this key)

Q - Deposit items into Keep/Castle, when close

E - Upgrade Inventory Size

Notes-

Just like the real economy this has no end in sight.

Please note there really is no end to this.

Sound Effect by - NendaSimic - https://opengameart.org/content/picked-coin-echo
